verbose_text: Upon in vitro activation, CD8 + T cells that produced IFN-gamma also showed an enhanced rate of autophagy (XREF_FIG A and 4B; LC3 staining and cytokine release controls are shown in XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY E; LC3 staining by FlowCellect kit was performed in parallel to brefeldin A treatment and permeabilization with a transcription factor staining kit to confirm that autophagosome quantitation was equivalent by intracellular staining, r = 0.9404 p < 0.0001 for CD8 + T cells; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY F).
evidence: CD8 +  T cells that produced IFN-gamma
